Tags help folks navigate emails easier. -If you have questions about how to use Apache Beam, we recommend you try out the [user@](https://lists.apache.org/list.html?user@beam.apache.org) mailing list, and [StackOverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/apache-beam). +Tip 2: If you’re asking a troubleshooting question, provide as much information as possible to help others replicate your issue or find possible solutions. -[^1]: To subscribe or unsubscribe, a blank email is fine. +Tip 3: Share complete links instead of hyperlinks. A common practice in Apache is adding a number tag like [1] to indicate a word is a link or an attachment, and use the ta as a footnote to add the complete link at the end of your message.
